**Welcome to my ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Application portfolio webpage!**

## code block

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

gap<-gapminder
options(repr.plot.width = 5, repr.plot.height =2)
gap %>%
  filter(year==2007, continent=='Asia') %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=country, y=pop),height = 10 , width = 50) + geom_bar(stat='identity')
```
